Package com.comp2042.model

package com.comp2042.model
Game model and state management.

This package contains classes that represent the core game state, including the game board, scoring system, level management, and game constants. These classes form the model layer of the MVC architecture.

Key responsibilities:

  • Game board state and piece management
  • Scoring and high score tracking
  • Level progression and speed calculation
  • Game constants and configuration
  • Block and shape data structures
Version:
1.0
Author:
Rajul Kabir
  • Class
    Description
    Block
    Immutable record representing a Tetris block shape.
    Board
    Interface representing the game board for a Tetris game.
    GameConstants
    Centralized constants for the Tetris game application.
    HighScoreManager
    Utility class for managing high score persistence.
    LevelManager
    Manages level progression and lines cleared tracking for the Tetris game.
    LevelManager.LevelUpdateResult
    Result object containing level update information.
    NextShapeInfo
    Immutable data class containing information about the next rotation state of a piece.
    Score
    Manages the game score using JavaFX properties for reactive UI binding.
    SimpleBoard
    Concrete implementation of the Board interface.
